blog.name: fire1033
blog.title: What I see.
blog.description: Life through mine and your eyes.

body:
Inter house couples.

Imagine couples from different houses, and their reactions when people are mean to their SO. Like with a Ravenpuff couple, If someone makes fun of the Puff they end up with their stuff enchanted to attack them whenever they leave their room, or if they insult the Raven, the Puff slowly, determinedly crushes them in every way possible. And all the couples start protecting each other and standing up against bullies, and more couples join them. As more people start dating outside their house, they start spending time with the other houses, and the unity skyrockets.

summary: May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their...
body:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

summary: Okay, but imagine Arthur Weasley showing Harry his muggle collection to the tune of part of your world from The Little Mermaid....
body:
Okay, but imagine Arthur Weasley showing Harry his muggle collection to the tune of part of your world from The Little Mermaid.

 Arthur:  I want to be where the muggles are
I want to see
want to see ‘em dancin’
Walkin’ around on those
Whad'they call 'em?

Harry: The muggles call them feet too, Mr. Weasley…

summary: Someone New (part 10) please find the previous parts here : 1 - 2 - 3 - 4 - 5 - 6 - 7 - 8 - 9 *** Harry found himself kissing...
body:
Someone New (part 10)

please find the previous parts here : 1 - 2 - 3 - 4 - 5 - 6 - 7 - 8 - 9

***

Harry found himself kissing Pansy goodbye before hugging Neville tightly. The girl was obviously making effort to stay awake as she waved them out of the room. The day has been long, and as he found himself alone with Malfoy and Nott, he hoped for the night to be easy on him. He had agree on spending it at their, finishing the nursery while the other boys would clean the house and babyproof it before Augusta Longbottom and Narcissa Malfoy invade it the next morning. Everything has to be perfect for the two grand(grand)mothers, but with Alyssa showing up two weeks earlier than planned, Neville was more stressed out than for a detention with Snape. Harry didn’t have the heart to say no. Once a saviour… he sighed, following the two Slytherin out in the night.

“Harry.” Nott called him, slowing down his pace so Malfoy would be a few steps ahead. “Thank you for coming helping. I know you were supposed to come back to Hogwarts.

-I wasn’t going to let Neville down.

-Sure… Are you… Are you okay, walking with us? Or do you rather Apparate home?

-As you want. I haven’t really talked to Malfoy since- I haven’t really talked to him so I don’t want to make him uncomfortable.

-Then walk with us.” He smiled. In front of them, Malfoy has crouched before a bike and was slowly freeing it from its chain. “Dray, do you have a spare bus ticket?”

Sitting beside Nott in the bus, Harry looked at the last photo he had taken during the day. He hadn’t even realised that he’s been photographed when he met Alyssa, but the picture was there.

“Do you wanna keep it? I’ve got another one of you.” He offered, tiding the rest of the pictures.

“Thank you.” He answered, still looking at it. It was muggle and slightly blurred as he has just moved his hand toward the baby but he couldn’t help but smile at it. Quickly glancing at the real Malfoy, Harry couldn’t help but being overwhelmed by the same feeling he had felt a few hours ago. Hood on, the blond boy was looking out of the window, his forehead resting against the glass and for a few seconds, he would have wish to be a legilimens.

“You can talk to him, you know.” Nott whispered in his ear.

“I don’t

-Whatever Potter.” He smirked, and Harry could feel the blush spreading across his cheeks.

***

NB : i will update the story on monday, wednesday and friday to avoid weeks without posting when i’m blocked/busy. I hope it’s ok for you :) 

Thank you for reading !

@agalaxyofthewolfstars @delicate-velvet @abstractundefined @books-for-sure @areasontobreathe @secretlycrazyhummingbird @nothingsronwithme

title: Woke Up New
body:
by lostamongtheundergrowth

Ever since he was turned at age five, Remus Lupin has turned to starvation to cope when his back’s against the wall, always managing to narrowly avoid confrontation or intervention by careful controlling his disorder. But 50 years on, his guilt at surviving the Second Wizarding War when Dora and Sirius did not has seen his illness slowly spiral out of control. Now he must decide, once and for all, whether he wants to live - and, if so, whether it’s too late for him to turn things around. Solidarity is found in unexpected places.

—

Eventual pairing: Remus/Severus; references to past Sirius/Remus, Remus/Nymphadora. Other than Remus’ and Severus’ canon-divergent survival, which will be explained, all other deaths happened as in canon.

Words: 2199, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Remus Lupin, Severus Snape, Harry Potter, Ginny Weasley, Merlin (Merlin), Sirius Black, Nymphadora Tonks, Teddy Lupin
  • Relationships: Remus Lupin/Severus Snape, Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, Remus Lupin/Nymphadora Tonks, Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley, Teddy Lupin/Victoire Weasley, Merlin/Arthur Pendragon (Merlin)
  • Additional Tags: Eating Disorders, Remus Lupin Lives, Severus Snape Lives, Sad Remus Lupin, Bisexual Remus Lupin, Werewolf Remus Lupin, Anorexia, Remus Lupin has anorexia, Merlin Emrys has anorexia, Food Issues, Weight Issues, Hospitals, Hospitalization, Past Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, Past Remus Lupin/Nymphadora Tonks - Freeform, Past Merlin/Arthur Pendragon - Freeform, Immortal Merlin, Depression, Not Canon Compliant, Canon Divergence - Post-Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, Post-Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Set one year before the epilogue, not that it really matters

Read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2TeogPz

trail.content_raw:
by lostamongtheundergrowth

Ever since he was turned at age five, Remus Lupin has turned to starvation to cope when his back’s against the wall, always managing to narrowly avoid confrontation or intervention by careful controlling his disorder. But 50 years on, his guilt at surviving the Second Wizarding War when Dora and Sirius did not has seen his illness slowly spiral out of control. Now he must decide, once and for all, whether he wants to live - and, if so, whether it’s too late for him to turn things around. Solidarity is found in unexpected places.

—

Eventual pairing: Remus/Severus; references to past Sirius/Remus, Remus/Nymphadora. Other than Remus’ and Severus’ canon-divergent survival, which will be explained, all other deaths happened as in canon.

summary:
Wood
English Oak is a wand for good times and bad, this is a friend as loyal as the wizard who deserves it. Wands of English oak...
body:
Wood

English Oak is a wand for good times and bad, this is a friend as loyal as the wizard who deserves it. Wands of English oak demand partners of strength, courage and fidelity. Less well-known is the propensity for owners of English oak wands to have powerful intuition, and, often, an affinity with the magic of the natural world, with the creatures and plants that are necessary to wizardkind for both magic and pleasure. The oak tree is called King of the Forest from the winter solstice up until the summer solstice, and its wood should only be collected during that time (holly becomes King as the days begin to shorten again, and so holly should only be gathered as the year wanes. This divide is believed to be the origin of the old superstition, “when his wand’s oak and hers is holly, then to marry would be folly,” a superstition that I have found baseless). It is said that Merlin’s wand was of English oak (though his grave has never been found, so this cannot be proven).

Core

As a rule, dragon heartstrings produce wands with the most power, and which are capable of the most flamboyant spells. Dragon wands tend to learn more quickly than other types. While they can change allegiance if won from their original master, they always bond strongly with the current owner. The dragon wand tends to be easiest to turn to the Dark Arts, though it will not incline that way of its own accord. It is also the most prone of the three cores to accidents, being somewhat temperamental.

Length

Most wands will be in the range of between nine and fourteen inches. While I have sold extremely short wands (eight inches and under) and very long wands (over fifteen inches), these are exceptionally rare. In the latter case, a physical peculiarity demanded the excessive wand length. However, abnormally short wands usually select those in whose character something is lacking, rather than because they are physically undersized (many small witches and wizards are chosen by longer wands).

Flexibility

Wand flexibility or rigidity denotes the degree of adaptability and willingness to change possessed by the wand-and-owner pair - although, again, this factor ought not to be considered separately from the wand wood, core and length, nor of the owner’s life experience and style of magic, all of which will combine to make the wand in question unique.

tags: irl interaction between me and my friends
draco and I are conceited little bitches
summary: One Night in the Slytherin Common Rooms
title: One Night in the Slytherin Common Rooms
body:
Blaise (to Draco): Dude, since when did you get a bloody 6-pack?!?

Draco: What?

Theo: You have a 6-pack and I’m positive the most exercise you do is stirring a potion

Draco: Really? I haven’t noticed

Blaise:

Theo:

Draco: I know it may not seem like it but I don’t notice everything about myself

Blaise:

Theo:

Barack Obama:

Hitler:

Draco: Who am I kidding of course I noticed

Draco: Do you think Potter would like it

summary: Remus: Ok, you haven’t eaten in a week and you need food desperately. The only food you can find is being guarded by a troll....
body:
Remus: Ok, you haven’t eaten in a week and you need food desperately. The only food you can find is being guarded by a troll. What do you do?

James: I make Sirius get around the troll and bring me some chicken.

Remus: Sirius isn’t with you.

James: Where’s Sirius?

Sirius: Yeah, where am I?

Remus: I don’t know

James: Then I go find Sirius and make him get around the troll.

Remus: You can’t

James: Why not?

Remus: Because

Sirius: Because Why?

Remus: SIRIUS IS DEAD. WHAT DO YOU DO?

James: I go to Sirius’ memorial and eat the food at the buffet.

*James and Sirius high five*
